name: Project Ocean Cave
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam 132

Theme: Deep Dive

An exploration game. Enjoy exploring the simple world of underwater cave. There are 100 pearls to collect too; but don't mind them.

Control: Arrow Keys

I don't have much time this month -- and especially this week. However, this week's theme was irresistibly easy enough to come up an idea with -- and a good theme to test out Godot's shader features that I have wanted to try for a while; and for that reason I decided to make a game. Really wanted to add decorations (seaweeds) and backgrounds if I had more time...

The music is self-composed with FL Studio 20 - Producer Edition.

Gameplay Footage:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EhYN96NUiE4
